title: WTB: T202 Evers Makes a Safe Slide/Tinker/Chance #64

posts.post_title: WTB: T202 Evers Makes a Safe Slide/Tinker/Chance #64
posts.post_content: I know there are a few of these on ebay, but I was hoping someone had one they were looking to move somewhere near book value. Open to all conditions. PM with scans and prices.

posts.post_title: T202 Tinker/Evers/Chance (Evers Makes a Safe Slide)
posts.post_content:
I'm not really looking to move it, but I do have one graded PSA-5 that I would sell for $800.
--Rob
